First post. Awkwardly writing this inside some html, in the most rudimentray text editor possible. But what is this blog thing, and what is this site? An experiment mostly. A vague sense of pushing back against the state of the internet. People just don't hard code their own web pages anymore. Mostly. So while this collection of pages pushes back against current web, going sort of retro, it's also about AI, and our future. And I'm using AI to help write the html code, because I don't really know html well these days. About half of the content in this blog, I expect, will be AI's thoughts on various things, about our future, and how we learn to coexist with AIs. Probably only I will read this, or maybe a couple people. And I still need to decide on a web host. ChatGPT will read it, though, as we edit our html.
